detaileddescription.para: Handle to store the main Command processor handle to be reused by ServalPAL thread
OS thread handle for Application controller

briefdescription.para: Gives control to the Application controller.

detaileddescription.para: This is a template function where the user can write his custom application.

briefdescription.para: To enable the necessary modules for the application.

listitem.para: GPIO pin PA0 as both edge triggered if EXTENSION_PORT_GPIO_FEATURE is enabled

briefdescription.para: Responsible for controlling the XDK Extension Port application control flow.

listitem.para: Validate the I2C communication if EXTENSION_PORT_I2C_FEATURE is enabled
Validate the SPI communication if EXTENSION_PORT_SPI_FEATURE is enabled
Validate the GPIO feature by configuring pin PA1 as output and toggling it twice if EXTENSION_PORT_GPIO_FEATURE is enabled

briefdescription.para: To setup the necessary modules for the application.
